column3: if you have young children and want to introduce them to basic engineering principles (gears, pulleys and levers etc)&nbsp
column4: this is a fabulous set and really worth tracking down. There is a smaller set, #9652 which is also worth sourcing and increases the numbers of&nbsp

column1: The parts selection is superb and feel wonderful to handle and assemble. The large yellow gears are about 5.5 Duplo
column2: studs in dia. so are incredibly robust and safe to handle. A particular highlight is the worm drive and housing which is brilliant for using in mobile crane type constructions.

column1: Of course the price of this set is a bit eye-watering. My advice, occasionally check the usually online auction sites
column4: do come up every now and then from bankrupt-stock type retailers.

column1: The set also comes with a set of idea cards to inspire curious young minds and are a welcome addition. Of course using with and adding play-value to '
